    • Constructor Detail

      • Response

        public Response(Question question,
                int idx)
        Sets the qText variable to the Questions question string. Sets the section variable to the Questions heading string, initialises the ArrayLists passes to addAnswer()
        Parameters:
        question - The question to add from
        idx - The index of the first answer

    • Method Detail

      • addAnswer

        public void addAnswer(Question question,
                      int idx)
        Adds an answer to the Response. Returns immediately if the answer is already present. Adds the question string to the answers variable and the Fact to the facts variable.
        Parameters:
        question - The question from which to add an answer
        idx - The index of the answer and fact
